title: Integrating traditional and local knowledge into disaster risk reduction policies: Insights from Nepal, India and Bangladesh
content:
Publication date: September 2024

Source: Environmental Science & Policy, Volume 159

Author(s): Prakash Kumar Paudel, Sital Parajuli, Rajiv Sinha, Meena Bohara, Md. Anwarul Abedin, Basanta Raj Adhikari, Suraj Gautam, Rabin Bastola, Indrajit Pal, Henry P. Huntington
